021import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
022import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
023import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
024import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.manager.MenuManager;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
030
031import java.util.Collections;
032import java.util.Optional;
033import java.util.UUID;
034
035/**
036 * EnchantmentSelectionPage
037 *
038 * @author creatorfromhell
039 * @since 0.1.3.0
040 */
041public class BalTopPage {
042
043  protected final String returnMenu;
044  protected final String menuName;
045  protected final int menuPage;
046  protected final int returnPage;
047  protected final String pageID;
048  protected final int menuRows;
049
050  public BalTopPage(final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
051                    final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final String pageID,
052                    final int menuRows) {
053
054    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
055    this.menuName = menuName;
056    this.menuPage = menuPage;
057    this.returnPage = returnPage;
058    this.pageID = pageID;
059
060    //we need a controller row and then at least one row for items.
061    this.menuRows = (menuRows <= 1)? 2 : menuRows;
062  }
063
064  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
065
066    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
067    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
068
069      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
070      final int page = (Integer)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(menuName + "_PAGE", 1);
071      final int items = (menuRows - 1) * 9;
072      final int start = ((page - 1) * items);
073      final int maxPages = (MenuManager.instance().getHelper().enchantments().size() / items) + (((MenuManager.instance().getHelper().enchantments().size() % items) > 0)? 1 : 0);
074
075      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
076      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
077
078      if(maxPages > 1) {
079
080        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
081                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
082                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
083                                           .withActions(new DataAction(menuName + "_PAGE", prev), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
084                                           .withSlot(0)
085                                           .build());
086
087        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
088                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
089                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
090                                           .withActions(new DataAction(menuName + "_PAGE", next), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
091                                           .withSlot(8)
092                                           .build());
093      }
094
095      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
096                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
097                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
098                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
099                                         .withSlot(3)
100                                         .build());
101
102      for(int i = start; i < start + items; i++) {
103
104
105      }
106    }
107  }
108}
